name: The Partners
description:
The Partners is a strategy game developed by Monte Cristo Multimedia. It came out on 01-05-2002. Monte Cristo Multimedia published the game. The game is rated as "Skip" on RAWG.
The Partners is available on PC.
Arne Sultan and Lee Wolfberg produced the game. Don Adams, Earl Bellamy, Gary Nelson and Richard Benedict directed the game. Lalo Schifrin and Richard Hazard scored the game.
